long long int.description: Declares a variable of type long long.

double.description: Declares an unsigned variable of type double.

vector<bool>.description: Declares a vector of type bool.

vector<string>.description: Declares a vector of type string.

pair<int,int>.description: Declares a pair of type int and int.

vector<vector<int>>.description: Declares a 2D vector of type int.
